ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Groupby doesn't work on formula fields with numbers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? 1. Create two fields with type number, a and b and populate with values 2. Create a third field with type formula, c, (formula is {b}-{a}) 3. Select group by field c. 4. It shows the correct number of fields within count when collapsed, but on expanding it is a blank state and the count reduces to zero. ### Desired Behavior The goupby feature should work as it does with other fields. ### Project Details Node: **v18.5.0** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.203.2** ### Attachments _No response_
